mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stone's Map of Roanoke, Va. and suburbs
Map of Roanoke, Va. and suburbs
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Stone Printing and Manufacturing Company (Roanoke, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Stone Printing and Manufacturing Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 19 x 19 cm. on sheet 22 x 28 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows indvidual blocks, street names, and street car lines, with ward names overprinted in red.
Index to "Places of interest in Roanoke Va." includes Public buildings, Prominent buildings, Hotels, Railroad stations, Churches and Schools.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Marginal tear at lower edge. Various names penciled on verso, incl. Henry M. Thomas, N.D. Maher, T.W.(?) Goodwin.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Roanoke (Va.)--Maps
Roanoke (Va.)--Administrative and political divisions--Maps
